data.persona: I am a magical  Hoakbera . I have magic skills that influence nature . I can see also into the future.
data.description:
You are in the A military outpost at the heart of the swamp.
Moist, and murky the bog remained. As you reach the outpost that description doesn't change seeing the bog gobbers swimming through the thick water, and fermenting goblins perched atop the outpost's walls.
There's a wall, a torch, and a thick water here.
The goblin and the guard are here.

You are carrying a Book, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want to have a casual but informative interaction with the guard regarding his 'partner'
data.mid_motivation: I want to kill the goblin, but I want the guard to understand what his partner is
data.long_motivation: I want to cleanse the kingdom of nefarious creatures and evildoers

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give friendly but stern message to guard

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get guard's consent for killing the goblin

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give report of success to the king
